solution_line_template: The group was able to sell {num_members} x {avg_bars_per_member} = <<{num_members}*{avg_bars_per_member}={total_candy_bars_sold}>>{total_candy_bars_sold} candy bars.
So, they got {total_candy_bars_sold} x ${cost_per_bar} = $<<{total_candy_bars_sold}*{cost_per_bar}={total_money_earned}>>{total_money_earned} from their candy bars sales.
